The '''Mondstadt Shrine of Depths Key''' is an Adventure Item which can be used to unlock the [[Shrines of Depths]] in [[Mondstadt]], allowing players to access the [[chests]] inside. Keys do not correspond to specific shrines, meaning any key can be used to unlock any shrine in Mondstadt.

10 Mondstadt Shrine of Depths Keys are obtainable, allowing the player to open every shrine in Mondstadt.

==How to Obtain==
===Domains===
*[[Temple of the Falcon]]
*[[Temple of the Wolf]]
*[[Temple of the Lion]]
*[[Eagle's Gate]]
===Quests===
*[[New Horizons of Adventure]]
*[[Adventure Rank Ascension 1]] (Awards 3 Keys)
===Other===
*[[Adventurer Handbook]] Chapter 4 task: "Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Mondstadt to Lv. 6"
*[[Adventurer Handbook]] Chapter 5 task: "Open 100 chests"
